name: Gordon Translater
description: A modern Google Translate client with light/dark themes, time-based auto theme, and selection-to-translate.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://translate.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com data:;
